title: STAEDTLER logo font
content:
Does anyone know if this is a custom drawn logo or a font? Any ideas would be great. Thank you all.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo-Staedtler.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019002353/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo-Staedtler.jpg) | 66.06 KB |
author: nickplant

comments.content: Judging by the "S" and "A" I would say custom.
Certainly custom; badly constructed S, T top too heavy, etc.
